name: Blood Type
description:
A cooperative for two, where you play as research objects trying to escape from the laboratory. But they won't get out without each other.

Beware of employees, overcome challenges and, probably, you will be able to find freedom!

Few words about world

A world is torn apart by the consequences of globalization the world is torn apart by the consequences of globalization and attacks by terrorists. The ozone layer is gone. Humanity had to hide under the surface to avoid solar radiation. Salvation is sought in genetic engineering and our protagonists just became victims of such experiments.

Both characters are deficient. One is constantly luminesces and cannot do anything with its flippers, the other cannot swim or climb without help. These objects were never really meant to leave the lab — they're just an intermediate stage to create better soldiers. However, they decide to run away. Will they be better on the surface? Doubtful. And yet: a golden cage or cruel freedom?

How to play? 
  1. Download Hamachi or Radmin.
  2. Create a VPN tunnel. (Network>Create a new network...)
  3. Get your friends to join your network. (Network>Join an existing network...)
  4. If you use Hamachi, turn off the firewall on your computer. 
  5. Host game in BloodType
  6. Your friend has to press the «Join game» button until he will find your game in the servers list. 
  7. Have fun!
